Title: Browser Controller
Description:
BrowserController is a .NETlibrary for controlling WebBrowser component's web-page presentation. 
Using it you can controll WebBrowser's behavior using intergrated script language.
It's developed for use in .Net 2.0 projects
HomeWiki:
BrowserController is a .NET library for controlling behavior of WebBrowser component by using inegrated script language. BrowserController language is very simple but designed with "make complex things clear" idea in mind. Brief description of this languge see in Documentation.
Using this component you will be able to control web page displaying in your application any way you like to.
